Object Shape: Chevron, Diamond, Disc, Flash, Star-like, Other
Summary: Looked like 4 spheres as in my other videos this one might be true?
trends: There have been 29 other sightings in Durham

divs: sighting details i'm keith, needed some time off from looking for schematics of certain electronics to fix my computer that died on me? i went out for a walk to get some fresh air? i looked and saw a guy looking up in the sky to the west, south west, area and screaming look at the ufo? look at it? it flew by like a rocket out of nowhere? it hoverred for about an hour then hoverred to the south-westernly parrelle from highway 85 west. i have done readings\photos over time from (december till april)2008-2009 yr. first and so on untill now... the 4 spheres that looked as if it had specefically 3 orbs afire and one orb benieth the 2nd orb looking like this, "* * *" "*" . computer programming in school? lights flashed, as if they were imitating stars, in the way they glittered. as on a cold night? i have since gotten a few really good video's that i think you will enjoy?? some aren't perfect, but when a guy cant drive for trying to see the thing himself? i advise not too drive and look stop on the side first??!! here it is? there is a clear silouette from one of the anti-gravity thrusters on the backside of the ship. i was out side on the 3rd of december and using a new camera that i had grown fond of from cvs..i used it on occation for remembering trails as i walk along seeing and remembering my days, as a photographer, for olam mills studios. i've gotten some money shots for sale now? but i think the study of and the preservation of our race is first.. or atleased challenged? i will put my faith in god and pray as need be. from what ive seen i'd be alittle nervous too if i were you.. more like a threatened kind of feel? not scared? i later talked to senior? and he told me that it went over the trees and hovered right up there? and pointed upwards? i had a whitness??who would of thought? well, still haven't seen (mufon) here yet to get a statement?hint, hint?? i swear on the bible that none of this is fabricated in any way, shape, or form...this is how i got it.sorry? the video is alittle off since the driver saw it too?or tried too? it screwed him up when he saw it? we almost wrecked? i had a camera on a pouch on my belt.and took it out click 3 times, and i was on video mode? i held it untill the camera went off. sorry i couldn't get a better video than this?senior, that guy that was drinking, and i had a long talk about it and i found out it was hovering over the power station near here for some few minutes and stot off imediately..and stopped on a dime,as we southerners call it? and hovered for about an hour? i seemed to have a green ora around the ship? as a beam commong down widening as it gets to earth? or who or what ever it was interested in?then it lifted up into a fast orbit above and sit there for the rest all of 30-40 minutes? but i didn't get to see it for the time it left. i used my windows picture viewer to blow up the pictures and see it up close? if any one has seen this get in touch with me? through the mufon coordinator or head of staf .
